result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for interacting with a blockchain explorer API, managing data models, and handling contract information.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to blockchain exploration and data handling in separate files.

internal/infras/explorer/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with a blockchain explorer API to list contracts and retrieve contract ABIs.

internal/infras/explorer/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling responses and contract information in the explorer module.
